a-col/span.description: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to display: none

a-col/order.description: raster order, used in flex layout mode

a-col/offset.description: the number of cells to offset Col from the left

a-col/push.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right

a-col/pull.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left

a-col/xs.description: <576px and also default setting, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/xs.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }

a-col/sm.description: ≥576px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/sm.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }

a-col/md.description: ≥768px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/md.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }

a-col/lg.description: ≥992px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/lg.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }

a-col/xl.description: ≥1200px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/xl.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }

a-col/xxl.description: ≥1600px, could be a span value or an object containing above props
a-col/xxl.optionType: string | number | { span: string | number; offset: string | number; }
